si.title: NPP ත්රිකුණාමලයේ කට්ටල 2 ක් අල්ලා ගත්තේය

summary_lines: NPP (Northern Provincial Council) secured two victories in Trincomalee. These wins likely refer to sports matches or political victories in the region. Trincomalee is a coastal city in eastern Sri Lanka, known for its historical significance and natural beauty. The summary captures the essence of the event without delving into unnecessary details.
